Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale based on hydrated ion diameter

Experimental Validation.Method: Ion transport experiments under concentration gradient, molecular dynamics simulations
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Cs+ flux: 1.2 mmol m−2 h−1, (n-Bu)4N+ flux: 0.26 mmol m−2 h−1

Other Information.Additional Info: The combination of MIL-53 framework and poly(VS-co-AA) provides synergistic selectivity based on exclusion forces and Coulombic interactions.
